features: COSRX Centella Water Alcohol-Free Toner is a gentle, refreshing toner highly concentrated with only the calming ingredients; Ideal daily skin care item for sensitive skin to reduce redness and blemishes
Hydrocolloid patch prevent secondary infections and absorbs exudate to encourage wound repair process more faster

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Soothing & Hydrating This toner is boosted with Centella Asiatica Leaf Water to soothe the irritated skin caused by everyday stressors. It delivers instant hydration and a dewy glow. Watery, Light-weight Liquid Formulated with Jeju Island Water, it moisturizes and rebalances skin with natural ingredients. The toner will prep your skin texture gently and reduce redness while calming sensitive skin. Toner for Anytime, Anywhere This cooling toner mist can be used in the morning, over makeup, or whenever your skin needs a little refreshment. You can also use this toner as a facial mask on the face if you soak up the cotton pad and apply it over the face. So versatile!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great toner! Non harming ingredients!
reviews.reviewText: I love this toner, it doesn’t have harming ingredients, it smells good, light weight, the sprayer makes it feel refreshing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple yet effective- but I don’t use this over makeup
reviews.reviewText: Other than the Cica (cantella asiatica) that is in this mist, there are actually two other soothing ingredients: Panthenol (a humectant which is also used for barrier repair) and Allantoin (another humectant that protects skin and promotes wound healing). Other than that, there is Sodium Hyaluronate (another form of hyaluronic acid) and Betaine (another skin protectant and humectant). A lot of people spray their face with water before they apply serums so more moisture can be brought into their skin by their serums, and to ensure their serums absorb deeper- except I use this instead of water. That way I can also fix my skin irritation at the same time. This stuff has only 5 ingredients other than water so it’s light enough to do so. I also think that for that reason there is no way this stuff can break you out. So essentially this is always my next step after toner. But this spray only has one ingredient that kind of acts as an emollient in its formula (it’s mainly a solvent) and the rest of the ingredients are humectants. Because of this I’m pretty sure that if you spray this on your face AFTER putting on lotion, oil, or makeup, there is a high chance the “hydration” it provides will literally only be those 20 seconds your face is wet with the product- and when it dries, your skin will still be at the same level of hydration as it was before. So I’m shocked people are using it that way. I don’t think there are enough ingredients in it that can retain the moisture the humectants capture. But if you like that refreshed feeling with a little bit of soothing power instead of something that can actually rehydrate your skin then keep using it that way- IMO, other than using this to increase the level of hydration my serums give me, I think this is a good way to calm the skin without having to use an entire serum to do so, which allows me to use my other serums that target anti aging or brightening instead.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great hydrating toner!
reviews.reviewText: Once I started, I never looked back! I use the hydrating toner in between every step of my skin care routine, and my skin is consistently hydrated. I have less problems with tightness or dry spots. Applying before thicker skin care items, like my retinal or night cream, helps the product glide over my face easier without diluting the product! I haven’t had any issues with this toner pilling up alongside other products. Also a great price point compared to other brands, and performs the same if not better than its competitors. All around a great hydrating product!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Leaves my skin with a fresh dewy look. Definitely a good moisturizer. Not sure if it's doing much for my wrinkles but definitely worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this spray with the ceramide spray and snail mucin from this brand, following up with a gentle moisturizer. This combo, along with occasional gentle micro-needle roller to apply a vitamin C serum, has literally transformed my sensitive skin. I was experiencing breakouts, redness, and dryness. My skin is now smooth, calm, and even. But don't skip moisturizer as last step, especially in winter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: A very good toner. None drying but leaves face feeling clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: No smell just like water i feel fresh and you can only use little bit of it can take more than a month of using will order again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easiest toner to apply, and it really does a good job dispensing the toner. If you're ever super lazy like I am after a shower, this is great product to just spritz and stop there.

Me llego el producto hace unos días y ya he empezado a utilizarlo, tengo que decir que es fantástico, yo sufro de rojeces(no acné) y piel reseca con principios de rosácea, para tranquilizar mi piel usaba óxido de zinc por las noches y era magnífico, sin embargo es un producto pesado y molesto, además de solo poder usarlo por las noches, ningún otro producto me calma la piel cuando incluso me empieza a arder, por lo que quería algo que pudiera usar en la mañana y noche sin problema, sin ser tan pesado, con este tónico me he aplico en las mañanas y noches, ha sido fantástico mi piel no tiene rojeces, la deja totalmente calmada y puedo combinarlo con mi rutina diaria de skin care ❤️ Amo completamente, cuando lleve mas meses utilizándolo haré un update de este producto
It's very good toner calming also for my sensitive skin
Has been working really well for me. It isn’t harsh and I like that it’s fragrance and alcohol free

reviews.reviewTitle: Deja la piel suave y fresca
reviews.reviewText: Lo uso como tónico antes de mi tx para la cara
No words for my happinessGood product
